home2.intro2: I’m Xavi, a computer engineer graduated from the University of Lleida.
home2.intro3: Throughout my education and professional experience, I have gained solid expertise in various programming languages, including C/C++, Python, Java, TypeScript, JavaScript, X++, .NET and Solidity (among others), which allows me to easily adapt to different environments and projects.
home2.intro4: My main areas of interest focus on the design and development of new products and technologies, particularly in fields such as Artificial Intelligence, embedded systems, the Internet of Things (IoT) and Blockchain technology. I’m highly motivated by innovation and the pursuit of efficient solutions that deliver real value to people and organizations.
home2.intro5: In addition, I apply my passion for web development by building modern and scalable applications, as well as robust APIs, using cutting-edge libraries and frameworks such as Angular, React, ExpressJS and FastAPI (among others). My goal is to create reliable, secure, and easy-to-maintain solutions that bridge technology with user experience.
home2.connectme: Feel free to connect with me

about.content1: I’m Xavier Berga, a software engineer born and raised in Lleida (Catalonia) and currently based in Zaragoza (Spain).
about.content2: For 5 years I worked as a software developer specialized in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations, contributing to the development and rollout of solutions aimed at optimizing business and operational processes.
about.content3: I currently work at AgroMind, a company I co-founded, where I improve firmware and sensors, validate field prototypes, and evolve the platform by integrating AI models to turn data into smarter decisions for the agriculture and livestock sectors.
about.content4: I also work at InnovaOX, a company focused on data monitoring to strengthen biosecurity in farms and in chemical and food industries through IoT technologies.
about.content5: Beyond the world of code and technology, I have other passions that inspire me every day and help me maintain a creative and personal balance:
about.read: Reading books on economics and geopolitics.
about.travel: Exploring and getting lost in big cities.
about.nature: Hiking and enjoying nature on mountain trails.

projects.recentDescription: A selection of the most relevant projects I have worked on recently.
projects.groupInfraDesc: Core homelab services focused on privacy.
projects.desc1: The website you are visiting right now is my personal portfolio. It is built with React (Meta) and was my first project using this framework. Beyond being a presentation site, it has also been a learning lab where I experimented with new frontend technologies. You can check the code on GitHub.
projects.desc2: Company dedicated to offering specialized audits and training for the food industry, as well as cross-platform digital solutions to digitize, secure, and optimize data management. The project combines technical expertise, consultancy, and software development to help food companies adapt to the sector’s evolving needs.
projects.desc3: Business initiative focused on selling and installing advanced agricultural sensors integrated with a proprietary AI model. This intelligent platform helps optimize decision-making, reduce water consumption, accurately detect pests, and promote sustainable practices such as the use of organic fertilizers and regenerative agriculture.
projects.desc4: Application deployed in a Docker container on my home server and connected locally with Ollama to run open-source LLM models. The platform makes it possible to test and adapt different AI models, some of which are trained for very specific use cases. Contact me if you’d like more details.
projects.desc5: The server started out as a NAS to store memories and backups and provide local access. With the integration of Nextcloud, it has evolved into a complete and secure personal cloud that allows me to manage dozens of terabytes and use a wide range of useful applications.
projects.desc6: Open-source home automation platform deployed on my server. It currently manages a few smart devices, but I have several DIY projects planned to expand its functionality. It provides a solid foundation for turning the home into a more comfortable, efficient, and personalized environment.
projects.desc7: AdGuard deployed with Docker to block ads, malware, and trackers across all my devices. The system works at the network level, transparently, and improves both security and browsing speed. It is also remotely accessible, and I offer free credentials upon request.
projects.desc8: Eclipse Mosquitto deployed as a lightweight MQTT messaging broker to coordinate communication between the different devices in my IoT ecosystem. Thanks to this service, all devices exchange data quickly and reliably. I also provide free access for development environments upon request, for those who want to experiment.
projects.desc9: n8n deployed on my own server to build automation workflows between multiple applications and services, without the need for coding. It allows API integration, data management, and process execution in a flexible and visual way. I also provide free credentials upon request for those who want to try it and experiment.
